Text: Apollo set to launch locally produced Vredestein tyres in India
New Zealand captain Kane Williamson suffered a small tear in his left elbow tendon and was ruled out of the home ODI series against Bangladesh in March ahead of the IPL.
The Proteas speedster, a star performer for DC in the last edition, had tested positive for COVID-19 while in quarantine. But was retested and came out negative in three RT-PCR results.
100 oxygen beds to be made available at Ganesh Kala Krida Manch in Pune
